      • onSendButton

        public void onSendButton()
                  throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        Détects when we press on the send button and checks that the destination field and writing fields are not empty. If they are not empty, then we notify the controller so that he can send them.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
